DOC.brief_summary: We determine effect dietary intervention ( replacement refine rice whole grain legumes high intake vegetable ) circulate Lp-PLA2 activity enzyme activity peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) patient impaired fast glucose ( IFG ) , impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) newly-diagnosed type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Effects Circulating Lipoprotein-associated Phospholipase A2 ( Lp-PLA2 ) Activity Enzyme Activity Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells ( PBMCs ) Patients With Prediabetes Newly Diagnosed Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Ninety-nine patient impaired fast glucose ( IFG ) , impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) newly-diagnosed type 2 diabetes randomly assign either control group ( usual diet refine rice ) whole grain group .
DOC.criteria: Subjects impair fast glucose ( IFG , 100≤ fast glucose < 126 mg/dL ) newly diagnose type 2 diabetes ( fast glucose ≥126 mg/dL ) current and/or past history cardiovascular disease include angina liver kidney dysfunction thyroid pituitary disease unstable weight loss/gain ( ≥2 kg ) previous 12 month pregnancy lactation take medication supplement
